caption:
The photograph captures a congregation of people seated inside a church during a service. The image is taken from the rear of the crowd, looking towards the front, with multiple rows of wooden benches filled with attendees.

The audience consists of a diverse group of individuals of various ages. Many of the people are intently listening or praying, while others are looking in different directions. There is a mix of fashion from the time leaning towards casual and semi-formal attire.

The church interior features traditional design elements such as stained glass windows which illuminate the room with natural light, and pendant lighting fixtures hanging from the ceiling. The architecture appears to have an ornate quality, indicative of typical church designs, with a spacious feeling conveyed by the high ceiling and large windows.

The overall atmosphere of the photograph suggests a communal and solemn environment typical of a religious service.
title: Religion plays an important part in the lives of residents. The largest group of churchgoers are Roman Catholics. Members of the New Ulm Cathedral parish are shown attending a folk guitar mass. This weekly event was begun for the younger people and has become the most popular mass with standing room only. The church interior is decorated with Baroque carvings reminiscent of churches in southern Germany's Bavarian.
